unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: NFL Viewership
question_text:
In a survey on NFL viewership, $589$ subjects were asked if they watch NFL football on a regular basis during the season. In this survey, $43\%$ responded favorably, with a margin of error of $4\%$.

choices.text: Cannot be determined with the given information.
